paragraphs.text:
%pyspark

import pyspark.sql.functions as F
from pyspark.sql.types import IntegerType

habr_data_path = '/data/datasets/habr_data.csv'

habr_df = spark.read.load(habr_data_path, 
                        format='csv',
                        sep=',',
                        header="true")
                        
habr_df = habr_df.withColumn('rating', F.col('rating').cast(IntegerType()))

%pyspark

from pyspark.sql.window import Window

window_spec = Window.partitionBy('author_name').orderBy(F.col('rating').desc())

ranked_df = habr_df.withColumn('row_number', F.row_number().over(window_spec))\
                    .filter(F.col('row_number').isin([1,2,3]))\
                    .orderBy('author_name', 'row_number')
                    
z.show(ranked_df.select(F.col('author_name').alias('author'),
                        F.col('title').alias('article_title'),
                        F.col('row_number').alias('position')))

paragraphs.text:
%pyspark

from pyspark.sql.window import Window

words_df = habr_df.withColumn('title', F.lower(F.col('title')))\
                    .withColumn('words', (F.split(F.col('title'), '[^a-z]+')))\
                    .withColumn('words', F.explode('words'))\
                    .withColumnRenamed('words', 'word')\
                    .filter(F.length('word') > 1)

word_count_df = words_df.groupBy('word')\
                        .count()\
                        .orderBy(F.col('count').desc())

z.show(word_count_df)
